member.name: T:Epicor.Mfg.BO.PartClass
member.summary: Client side business object for PartClass.

member.name: T:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.PartClassImpl
member.summary: Contains the valid Part Class codes to be used in the system. Each Part master can be assigned to a Part Class. That class is then validated against this file. DELETE VALIDATION: Not allowed if referenced in the Part file.

member.summary: Inserts a new row in the DataSet with defaults populated.

member.summary: Returns a list of rows that satisfy the where clause.
member.param: An expression used to filter the rows. Can be left blank for all rows.
The maximum number of rows to return. Leave as zero for no maximum.
Whether there are more pages of rows available.

member.summary: Apply input data to BO by calling GetByID/GetNew/Update methods.
